## Rachel Cutsumpas

**About Me**
I am a creative problem solver who is passionate about strategy, marketing, and storytelling through data and research. As a lifelong learner and ever-curious thinker, I am currently pursuing a Masters of Marketing with an analytics concentration at the Zicklin School of Business at CUNY Baruch. After studying communications at Ithaca College in undergrad, I started my professional career in audience strategy at a tech startup, specializing in programmatic campaigns. I've continued to grow my experience in audience and data strategy while working on a global automotive account at Publicis. My background and interest in the performing and visual arts allow me to bring creative and new approaches to marketing projects of all types. 

*This site is a collection of projects for the course STA9750 - Software for Data Analysis.*
